Header.title: Professional paving and driveway company
Header.paragraph: Cheshire-based family run business with over 50 years combined industry experience

About.paragraph: We're a family run business serving the Cheshire and Manchester area. With over 50 years experience we carry out top quality work at affordable prices. Our paving experts can help you with all your paving and driveway needs, including Block Paving, Tarmac Services, Driveways, Patio Laying and much more. We provide an obligation-free quote for all your paving needs.

Services.name: Block Paving
Services.text: Fine Stone Paving specialise in fantastic quality Block paving. Whether youâ€™re paving your entire driveway, or just a small section or pathway, it can vastly improve the look of your property as well as being practical. Our range of block paving designs for driveway patio or paths offer a dazzling variety of textures, colours and designs that will transform your new block paving driveway or patio.

Services.name: Tarmac Driveways
Services.text: Tarmac can be a perfect solution to enhance Driveways and Paths, it can prove to be an extremely durable surface when installed properly. Dependant on the depth and structural make-up of the base (foundations) and the quality of top coat (overlay) initially applied the length of service tarmac will give, can vary. A well installed Tarmac driveway should be expected to have a minimum lifespan of 20 years onwards.

Services.name: Patios and Paths
Services.text: We know how to make the very best of small gardens, giving the illusion of space; and how to push the boundaries in exquisite garden design when it comes to larger outdoor spaces. Our talented team have helped hundreds of homeowners throughout Cheshire and the surrounding areas to enhance their properties with the addition of a new patio
